# hercedccd

The goal of hercedccd is to Fetch and wrangle data from the Department
of Educationâ€™s Common Core of Data

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES`](https://higherx4racine.github.io/hercedccd/reference/GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES.md)
  : The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels
